nodes.text: Stydge was a Trandoshan who worked as a security guard for the band Distraction, along with his brothers Rydge and Xydge. When the band traveled to the ship Sleemo Poya Jeedai to perform at a concert, Stydge and his brothers accompanied them and met with some spacers who were providing additional security during the event. He and his brothers cooperated with them in investigating the threat posed to the event by Niklas Cories.
